Name: Set minimum staffing standards for employees performing emergency medical services in the 911 system in a city with a population of over one million people. (A.7365-A/S.6698-A)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass A.7365-A/S.6698-A, which would set minimum staffing standards for employees performing emergency medical services in the 911 system in a city with a population of over one million people
BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

History.Description: This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Fire and Emergency Management
This Resolution was Introduced by Council
